attributes.action: Keep hair salons open in lock down allow people to visit salons
attributes.additional_details:
We have seen from the last lock down how important is was for people to get there hair done.
That was the most talk about topic. People need to feel good during the difficult times mental health is a massive issue and this lock down isn’t helping. It’s killing people.
attributes.background:
Allow us to work 
Keep hair salons open as we are a safe environment we use all PPE guidance follow all social Distancing rules 
The hair dressing environment is and always has been the cleanest of retail shops 
It’s for mental health is so important

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not require salons to close due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408

Keep the beauty industry open: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554478
